dao

Class AbstractDAO<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • dao.AbstractDAO<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - generic parameter, which allows the class to be used with an object of any type
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ClientDAO, OrderDAO, OrderItemDAO, ProductDAO

    public class AbstractDAO<T>
extends java.lang.Object
    Data Access class, implementing the operations available on the database: SELECT, INSERT, UPDATE, DELETE through reflection
